A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was horrible\, it made no sence and what little hope i hade after The Force Awakens is now gone.. they hade so much potential\, they hade great characters to work with and build up.. Snoke? All the suspence about who he is.. gone.. a fat little chinese girl becomes the new JarJar.. and Luke Skywalker the idol of several generation becomes a laughing stock and an embarrassment... This cannot be saved\, i will not be paying to see more Star Wars... and i LOVED star wars.
